name: huzzah
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to express excitement, pleasure, or approval: Huzzah! I found it!
More examplesFewer examplesIt is speculated that the state nickname Hoosier may have come from "Huzzah!" proclaimed after victory in a fight.The gathering gave cheers of "huzza! huzza! huzza!".

an expression of excitement, pleasure, or approval: Poised to attack, the soldiers hooted and shouted huzzahs. With a loud huzza, and flourish of his sword, he cried, "Charge the enemy!"
More examplesFewer examplesHe and his wife arrived to massive huzzahs.His premature victory huzza at the Sheffield rally just a few days before the election would have come too late to influence the outcome.
